import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../partials/Header"; function SignIn() { useEffect( async() => { UserData() }, []) const UserData = async() =>{ const result = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/users`) setloadUser(result.data) } const [loadUser, setloadUser] = useState(null) console.log(loadUser.map(loadUser => loadUser.email)) const [loginUser, setloginUser] = useState({ email: "", password: "" }) const onInputeChange = e => { setloginUser({...loginUser,[e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } const SubmitHandler = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() if (loginUser.email === loadUser.map(loadUser => loadUser.email) && loginUser.password === loadUser.map(loadUser => loadUser.password) ) { alert("Success") }else{ alert("Something Wrong") } } return (
